articles.description: Haryana Police has registered a case against former Indian cricketer Joginder Sharma and five others in connection with the suicide of a Hisar resident. Pawan had hanged himself on January 1 allegedly over a property dispute.
articles.content:
A case has been registered against former Indian cricketer and Haryana Deputy Superintendent of Police Joginder Sharma for his alleged involvement in the suicide of a Hisar resident.
Joginder Sharma… [+1256 chars]

articles.author: Akshay Sonawane
articles.title: Atomberg and Campa Cola team up with BCCI as central sponsors for home fixtures: Reports - SportsMint Media
articles.description: Atomberg and Campa Cola have teamed up with the BCCI as central sponsors in a long-term deal for the home series, according to sources.
articles.content: The Indian home appliances entity, Atomberg, and the soft drink brand, Campa Cola, have teamed up with the Board of Control for Cricket in India (BCCI) as central sponsors in a long-term deal for the… [+3056 chars]

articles.author: REDIFF CRICKET
articles.title: Kohli, Rohit's Farewell Gifts For Elgar - Rediff.com
articles.description: Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma showed their respect for the retiring Dean Elgar by presenting him with autographed India jerseys.
articles.content:
IMAGE: Virat Kohli speaks to Dean Elgar after the second Test against South Africa in Cape Town, January 4, 2023. Photograph: BCCI/X
